import React, {useState} from "react"; import style from "./photoModal.module.css" const PhotoModal = ({fullPhotoData}) => { const [textarea, setTextarea] = useState(''); const {photo, comments, id} = fullPhotoData; const setText = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setTextarea(e.target.value) const response = await fetch("http://test-backend.itdelta.agency/api/image/:"+ id + "/comments" ).then(data => data.json()) } return (
